64025.「いいか 若いの？\n こたびの戦い 必ず 仲間の魔物とともに\n 敵を倒してく:
You see, young man? This battle, you must go
out there with your companion monsters and
defeat the enemy.

64026.「おばあちゃん？ どうして……。\n ファーベルの命が かかってるんですよ？\n:
Grandma? Why... is Fabel's life in danger? Now
is not the time...

64027.「クラハさん。アンタは だまってな。\n これはね まもの使いの戦いなのさ。:
Mr. Klaha. You should be quiet. This is a
battle of the Monster Masters.

64028.「すみません…… おばあちゃん。\n 私なんかが 出過ぎたことを\n 言ってしま:
I'm sorry, Grandma. I know I overstepped the
mark...

64029.「それでは <pc>さん。\n お手数ですが 魔物商人の所へ乗り込む時は\n 必:
Now then . I'm sorry to bother you, but when you ride into the monster merchant's place, be sure to take your
companion monster with you.

64030.「ファーベルのこと……\n くれぐれも よろしくお願いしますね。: Fabel...please take good care of her.

64031.「……キッズに 何するつもりだッ！: What are you doing to Fry?

64032.「思いのほか 早く かぎつけられちまったな。\n まあいい。こいつが変わっていく:
I got sniffed out earlier than I expected. Oh
well. It will be fun to show his former owner
how he's changing.

64034.「キッズは ただのドラゴンキッズじゃない。\n 絶滅寸前の超希少な魔物……\n:
Fry is not just a Small Fry. They are the
children of the Golden King Lizard, a very
rare monster on the verge of extinction.

64035.「オレが作った このクスリを使えば\n みるみるうちに成長し そして\n オレの:
I created this drug that will make you grow up
and become the most powerful weapon in the
world, at my command!

64036.「それで キッズに\n レンドアを襲わせるのか……。: So you want Fry to attack Lendor...

64037.「ああ そうだ！ レンドア島壊滅は\n いわば デモンストレーション！:
Oh, yes! The destruction of Lendor Island was
a demonstration!

64038.「これが成功すれば 魔物のチカラを求める\n 裏社会の要人たちから 引く手あまた:
If we succeed, we'll be in the crosshairs of
the underworld for the power of monsters! We
monster merchants will be rich!

64039.「ゆるせねえ……。\n 魔物たちを そんなふうに扱いやがって……。:
I hate you... for treating those monsters like
that...

64040.「ふっ。魔物は 元々 人間の敵でしかない存在。\n その魔物に 新たな価値を見出:
Huh. Monsters were originally nothing more
than enemies of humans. I'd like to praise you
for finding new value in these monsters.

64041.「さあ おしゃべりは終わりだ。\n そろそろ ショーを始めようじゃないか。:
Okay, chit-chat's over. It's time to get the
show on the road.

64043.「ガ…ギャギャガ……グァアアア……！: Gah... gah... gah... gah... gah... gah...!

64046.「美しい……。\n これが ゴールデンキングリザード……。: Beautiful... this is the Golden King Lizard...

64047.「お前らの好きにはさせねえ……。\n オレとキッズの絆…… 取り戻してみせる！:
I won't let you do whatever you want. I will
get back the...bond between me and Fry!

64050.「ハーッハッハッハ！！ バカか！\n お前みたいなハンパ者が この最強の魔物を\:
Ha-ha-ha! You idiot! There's no way that a
loser like you can tame the most powerful
monster of all!

64052.「お前は たしか <cs_pchero>と言ったな。\n さしずめ オレたちのレ:
I think you say <cs_pchero>. I guess you're
here to destroy our mission to destroy Lendor
Island.

64053.「残念だが この通り キッズは変身を果たした。\n 部下たちも 今頃 商品ナンバ:
Alas, as you can see, Fry has been transformed. My guess is that his men have by now unleashed Item Number 13 and are launching
a raid on Lendor Island.

64054.「だが せっかく ここまで来たのだ！\n 生まれ変わったキッズが どれほどの実力:
But we've come this far! I'll show you what a
reborn Fry can do!

64055.「いくぞぉぉぉ まもの使い！！: Let's go, ooh, a Monster Master!

64056.「こっけいだな ファーベル。\n 飼い犬…… いや 飼い魔物に\n 手をかまれた:
That's ridiculous, Fabel. How does it feel to
be bitten on the hand by your own dog... or
rather, your own monster?

64057.「こりずに また来たのか <cs_pchero>。\n 圧倒的な実力差を 見せつ:
You are back again, <cs_pchero>. You are a
fool not to back down after being shown the
overwhelming difference in your abilities.

64058.「まあいい。レンドア島に乗り込む前に\n もう少し ゴールデンキングリザードに\:
Oh well. Let's let the Golden King Lizard do a
little more prep work before we ride into
Lendor Island.

64059.「いくぞぉぉぉ まもの使い！！: Let's go, ooh, a Monster Master!

64060.「クッ。ゴールデンキングリザードが\n やられた……だと……？: Kuh. Golden King Lizard has been killed...?

64062.「ごめんなさい こんな所まで。\n どうしても ファーベルが心配で……:
I'm sorry to come all this way. I couldn't
help it. I was worried about Fabel.

64064.「あの目の色……。\n まさか あれが キッズなんですか……？\n なんてこと…:
That eye color... you don't think that's Fry?
Oh, my God.

64065.「おお！ なんという 生命力……。\n いけえぇっ ゴールデンキングリザード！\:
Oh! Go, Golden King Lizard! Kill them all
here!

64066.「今のキッズは 単なる破壊の化身……。\n このまま 放っておけば\n たくさん:
Fry now is simply destruction incarnate... and
if left unchecked, many will be killed.

64067.「<cs_pchero>さん…… 後生です。\n キッズを……楽にしてあげてくだ:
<cs_pchero>...it's a later life. Fry...make
it easy for them.

64075.「ふふふ。\n あなたたちって 本当に 仲がいいのね。\n まるで 兄弟みたい。:
Hmmm. You guys are really close. You're like
siblings.

64076.「あったりまえだろ！\n キッズとオレは ずーっと ずぅぅっと……: It's a given! Fry and me, we've been...

64077.「ずぅぅーーーーっと 一緒なんだからな！！: I'm with you all the way!

64079.「はは……。\n キッズが……キッズが 元に戻ったぞ！！\n やった やった……: Ha... Fry...Fry is back! Yay, yay...yay!

64080.「チッ。ここは ひとまず 退却か……。: Damn. I guess we should retreat for now...

64083.「逃がさんぞ この悪党め。\n 魔物たちを好き勝手に もてあそんだ罪\n たっぷ:
I won't let you get away, you scoundrel. I'll
make you pay for the crime of playing with the
monsters as you please.

64084.「心配せんでも お前さんの手下どもは\n もう ふんじばって レンドアに届けてき:
Don't worry, I've already delivered your
minions to Lendor in a huff. Go raise hell
with them.

64085.「ファーベル それから そこの若いの。: Fabel Then the young one there.

64086.「まもの使いの強さは 魔物との絆の強さ。\n ……忘れるんじゃないよ ふたりとも:
The strength of a Monster Master is the
strength of his bond with his monster. Don't
forget, both of you.

64088.「まったく あなたって子はっ\n 私が どれだけ 心配したと……:
You know, I can't tell you how worried I
was...

64090.「今までずっと 心配させて ゴメン。\n オレ ようやく 心が決まったよ。:
I'm sorry for making you worry all this time.
I've finally made up my mind.

64091.「オレ なるよ。\n <cs_pchero>さんや 父さんみたいな\n かっこい:
I'm going to become one. I'm going to be a
cool Monster Master like <cs_pchero> and my
dad.

64094.「へへ。母さん こんなだし\n オレが 家まで送ってくよ。:
Heh. Mom, it's not like this. I'll walk you
home.

64095.「……<cs_pchero>さん 今まで ありがとう。\n アンタが 魔物との絆:
... Thank you for everything. You taught me how to bond with monsters, and I think that's why I was able to hold on until
the end...

64096.「いつか <cs_pchero>さんに 負けないくらい\n 強い まもの使いにな:
Someday I'll be a Monster Master as strong as
<cs_pchero>, so let's fight each other's
monsters!

64098.「先ほどは なんだか お恥ずかしいところを\n お見せして 申し訳ありませんでし:
I apologize for the embarrassment I caused you
earlier. Please rest assured that I am back
safe and sound.

64099.「それでですね <pc>さん……。\n こちらに戻ってくるなり シガール様から\:
So, <pc>... as soon as I got back
here, I received a letter from Lady Sigal. I
will read it.

64100.「……ミセス・クラハ そして まもの使い。\n 我が愛するレンドアを 魔物商人の:
Mrs. Kraja, and Monster Master. I thank you from the bottom of my heart for saving my beloved Lendor from the clutches of a monster
merchant.

64101.「私は まもの使いという職業に 海よりも深い\n 感銘を受けた。この誇り高い職業:
I am more deeply impressed by the vocation of a Monster Master than by the sea. I would like to do my best to introduce this proud vocation
to the world.

64102.「我がレンドアは 定期船と鉄道駅を有し\n 多くの人々が行き交う 世界の交差路…:
Lendor, with its liner and train stations, is
a crossroads of the world where many people
come and go...

64103.「貴君らの かがやかしい功績は\n またたく間に 世界へと広まっていくであろう。:
Your noble exploits will soon be spreading
around the world.
               Mayor Sigal of Port Town Lendor

64104.「……ついに かなったんです。\n 私と……夫の夢が。:
...finally came true. My dream and my
husband's dream.

64105.「ファーベルも この手紙を読むと\n 自分のことのように よろこんでくれました。:
When Fabel read this letter, she was as
pleased as if it were her own.

64106.「今度は 自分が 夢をかなえる番だと言って\n キッズと 修業の旅に出てしまいま:
He said it was his turn to make his dream come
true, and he and Fry set off on a journey of
training... He's so simple, isn't he?

64107.「<pc>さん……。私たちが\n ここまで来られたのは あなたのおかげです。\n:
<pc>... we have come this far because
of you. Thank you so much.

64108.「あのきびしい おばあちゃんも\n あなたのことを 一人前だと認め\n プレゼン:
Even that harsh grandmother recognized you as
one of her own and gave you a gift.

64109.「これは 真の まもの使いが持つ\n まもの使いの証。シガール様からの報酬と\n:
This is the Proof of MON that a true Monster
Master possesses. Please accept this along
with your reward from Sigal.

64110.「シガール様からの報酬と 一緒に\n どうか こちらを受け取ってください。:
Please accept this along with your reward from
Mr. Sigal.

64111.「……じつは ここに もうひとつ\n まもの使いの証があります。: ...In fact, here is one more Proof of MON.

64112.「これは 夫の まもの使いの証。\n 夫は これをにぎりしめて 倒れていました。:
This is the Proof of MON of my husband. My
husband was clutching it when he collapsed.

64113.「いつか ファーベルが 一人前の\n まもの使いになったら 渡してくれ……。\n:
I had a feeling that he was saying to me,
"Someday, when Fabel becomes a full-fledged
Monster Master, give it to me."

64114.「次の 私の夢は これをファーベルに渡すこと。\n <pc>さん 応援していてく:
My next dream is to pass this on to Fabel.
<pc> Keep up the good work!
